thread.title: Brighter and Ericsson in cooperation on technology and business development in mHealth
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Brighter and Ericsson in cooperation on technology and business development in mHealth | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Brighter and Ericsson in cooperation on technology and business development in mHealth
text:
Oct 5 Brighter publ AB :
* Brighter and Ericsson launches a partnership to simplify connection of MedTech, such as next-generation Brighter One
* This is an integrated blood glucose meter and injection device for insulin treated diabetics, which logs blood glucose value, actual volume of injected insulin, as well as other information relevant to the treatment
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
